scripts.build: bun run --filter='*' build && bun run build:server:post
scripts.build:server:post: rm -rf packages/server/res && mkdir -p  packages/server/res && cp -r node_modules/@sockethub/examples/build packages/server/res/examples && cp node_modules/@sockethub/client/dist/* packages/server/res/ && cp node_modules/socket.io/client-dist/socket.io.js packages/server/res/socket.io.js
scripts.clean:deps: bun run --filter='*' clean:deps && bunx rimraf node_modules
scripts.dev: bun run build && cd packages/sockethub && bun run dev
scripts.docker:start: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up prosody sockethub -d
scripts.docker:clean:all: bun run docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
scripts.docker:clean:sockethub: bun run docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1; docker rmi sockethub-sockethub
scripts.docker:build: bun run docker:clean:sockethub; bun run docker:start
scripts.integration: bun run integration:redis && bun run integration:browser
scripts.integration:browser: bun run docker:start && bun run integration:browser:run; RES=$?; exit $RES
scripts.integration:redis: bun run docker:start:redis && bun run integration:redis:run; RES=$?; docker compose down; exit $RES
scripts.lint: bunx prettier --check . && bunx eslint --max-warnings 0 . && bun run --filter='*' lint && bun run lint:doc
scripts.lint:fix: bunx prettier --write . && bun run --filter='*' lint:fix && bun run lint:doc:fix
scripts.publish: bun run clean && bun run lint && bun run build && bun run doc && bun test && lerna publish --dist-tag latest --pre-dist-tag next
